amendment.description: To ensure that pharmacies operated by the Indian Health Service and Indian health programs are included in the network of pharmacies established by entities and organizations under part D.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1086 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1086 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S8647) To ensure that pharmacies operated by the Indian Health Service and Indian health programs are included in the network of pharmacies established by entities and organizations under part D.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1086 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Murkowski.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1086 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
